title: a file output obect
description: Represents the collective fields needed to indicate an output file, destination and format

output.description: An object describing the requested file outputs (a new psd file or supported renditions)

overwrite.description: If the output file already exists should it be overwritten.`overwrite` flag is used only when `storage = "adobe"`

quality.description: Quality of the JPEG outputs (will be ignored for other output types). Ranges from 0 to 12, with 12 as the highest quality.
Desired JPEG image quality, integers range from 0 to 12

storage.description: Is the asset stored on an external service (like AWS S3, Azure, Dropbox etc.)

href.description: Any public url or a presignedURL for the asset output
A string representing the path to the output file stored on Adobe's cloud.</br> Not available for the integrations created with JWT authentication or Service Principle.

storage.description: Is the asset stored on Adobe's cloud. </br> Not available for the integrations created with JWT authentication or Service Principle.

outputs.description: An array of output objects. each output object will be either 'external' or 'adobe'. Maximum limit to generate outputfiles in one API call is 25.
